price: Bali Saa ya Kiyama ndio miadi yao, na Saa hiyo ni nzito zaidi na chungu zaidi.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
footnotes: Bali Kiyama ndio miadi ya adhabu yao. Na Kiyama ni kizito zaidi, na kichungu zaidi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
